import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import orderStyle from './Order.module.css'; import CartContext from '../Context/CartContext'; const PlaceOrder = () => { const {totalAmount} = useContext(CartContext) return (

Delivery Information

Total Amount

SubTotal

${totalAmount}

Delivery Fee

{totalAmount===0?"$0":"$2"}

Total

${totalAmount+2}

{totalAmount===0}
) } export default PlaceOrder
